name: Princess Apocalypse
description:
Controls: WASD to move. Mouse to aim and Left Mouse Button to shoot

Platform: Windows

A Dating simulator/Visual novel game (with a twist) based in the post apocalyptic world. This game was made for the SAE Creative Jam (May,2020). The jam was one week long and 4 people worked on this project.

- Kartik Tiwari

- Kyan Rowse

- Morris Lee

- Avinash David Rasu Naidu
